# Getting data from GEO

We download GEO supplementary files to obtain realistic identifiers.

```{r}
library(GEOquery)

fetch_geo_supp <- function(gse, destdir = "data") {
  dir.create(destdir, showWarnings = FALSE, recursive = TRUE)
  GEOquery::getGEOSuppFiles(GSE = gse, baseDir = destdir, makeDirectory = TRUE)
  invisible(file.path(destdir, gse))
}

fetch_geo_supp("GSE119732")
fetch_geo_supp("GSE233947")
```
